mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.name name, a.icon icon, a.singerId singerId, a.singerName singerName, a.createTime createTime, a.remark remark, a.createCompany createCompany, ar.playNum playNum, ar.shareNum shareNum, ar.commentNum commentNum, a.introduction introduction, a.songNum songNum FROM album_base a INNER JOIN album_record ar ON a.id = ar.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.visible = true
SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM album_base a WHERE a.tagId = #{tagId} AND a.visible = true

SELECT a.id id, a.name name, a.icon icon, a.singerId singerId, a.singerName singerName, a.createTime createTime FROM album_base a WHERE a.tagId = #{tagId} AND a.visible = true ORDER BY a.createTime DESC LIMIT #{begin},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM album_base a WHERE a.singerId = #{singerId} AND a.visible = true

SELECT a.id id, a.name name, a.icon icon, a.singerId singerId, a.singerName singerName, a.createTime createTime FROM album_base a WHERE a.singerId = #{singerId} AND a.visible = true ORDER BY a.createTime DESC LIMIT #{begin},#{limit}

SELECT a.id id, a.name name, a.icon icon, a.singerId singerId, a.singerName singerName, a.createTime createTime FROM album_base a WHERE a.visible = true ORDER BY a.createTime DESC LIMIT #{begin},#{limit}
